field_description.processed: Naima Green-Riley is a Ph.D. Candidate and Raymond Vernon Fellow at Department of Government. She is also a Former Consular Officer at US. Consulate General in Guangzhou. Please register at https://harvard.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_eLCvJ6-0Rr2lNz68lP6IhQ.
